definitions.text: a group of people who adhere to a common faith and habitually attend a given church

examples: we do not doubt that England has a faithful patriot in the Lord Chancellor

definitions.text: marked by fidelity to an original
examples: a faithful copy of the portrait
a faithful rendering of the observed facts

definitions.text: not having sexual relations with anyone except your husband or wife, or your boyfriend or girlfriend
examples: he remained faithful to his wife
